document_data.name: Melurk Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Melurk Street''' was found in the town of [[New Velar|Harrowdale]].
document_data.Description: The road traveled north to south through the town running parallel to the cost of the [[Dragon Reach]]. It intersected [[Lancegallop Lane]] on the north side of town and exited Harrowdale in the south toward [[Scardale]].
document_data.Notable Locations:
* [[The Redmark]]
* [[The Lady of Good Fortune]]
* [[The Anchorage]]
* [[Toss Your Tankard]]
* [[Velarstown Silver and Jewelry]]
* [[The House of Mystra]]
